question: 光る
sourceMnemonic: This word consists of kanji with hiragana attached. Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>sunlight</kanji>, so the verb is <vocabulary>to shine</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to glitter</vocabulary>. Just imagine what happens when sunlight hits things!
sourceReadingMnemonic: Remember how you learned the reading for <ja>光</ja>? Well this is almost the same thing. Just change the <ja>り</ja> to <ja>る</ja> and you'll know this reading!
